entry.title: propagate
entry.content:
propagate

Propagate events from one event emitter into another.

An other sweet and simple module, that helps to propagate events!

Get it: npm install propagate

Sample usage:

```javascript var EventEmitter = require('events').EventEmitter; var propagate = require('propagate');

var evn1 = new EventEmitter(); var evn2 = new EventEmitter();

propagate(evn1,evn2);

evn2.on('event',function(msg) {

console.log('Got a propagated event', msg);

});

evn1.emit('event', 'Yo!') // Got a propagated event Yo! ```

GIF FTW!

Thanks to Pedro Teixeira for propagate.
